item.description:
Ease your mind
Calm your body
Increase your creativity
And sense of well being

Use this opportunity to practice most common relaxation exercises in a warm, supportive group atmosphere.

This week's topic: Loving-Kindness and Compassion.
We will practice a loving- kindness meditation and talk about the use of positive emotions as an antidote to stress.

We will also have some chocolate to celebrate Valentine's Day and one year anniversary of the Stress Reduction and Relaxation meetup!
item.name: Stress Reduction and Relaxation: Loving -Kindness and Compassion
